section.p: Indicates a condition whereby the Veteran is not required to enroll. Veterans do not have to be enrolled if they: (1) have a service-connected disability of 50 percent or more (2) want care for a disability the military determined was incurred or aggravated in the line of duty, but which VA has not yet rated, during the 12-month period following discharge; or (3) want care for a service-connected disability only.
